ygData.subject: Re: Honeycombs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The reason you should be 20 is that you have to have ogre illusion to enter into ogguk.  Enchanter websites also claim that the level 20 increase faction
ygData.messageBody:
Joel Thronburg wrote:
>
> From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
> Actually you only have to be level 20 to complete it easily, although I have
> heard reports of enchanters as low as level 8 doing the quest.

The reason you should be 20 is that you have to have ogre illusion to
enter into
ogguk. Enchanter websites also claim that the level 20 increase faction
spell is also required.

Otherwise you are KOS by the guards which roam around. How a level 8
could get in (invis? but then many casters could do it) and talk to the
bartender is beyond me.

Luckily i have a level 23 enchanter so it should be easy enough.

---ralph
